game.name: Mega Mall Story
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 나만의 백화점을 만드는 게임! 다양한 가게를 배치해서 No. 1 백화점을 향해 Go Go!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Design a towering mega mall in this mall management simulation game.

reviewHighlights.text: [h2]It's kind of rough[/h2] I loved flash games like this when I was a kid, and I'd been looking for some of the old ones I'd used to play, or any mod...
It's decent if the game is on sale and you are a huge Kairosoft fan. but there are better Kairosoft games and other simulation games.
